verses.text: Masanil eb' israel ix el t'a lum tzinan lu'um yic Sin, k'ojank'olal ix aj sb'ey eb', ato syal tas tz'aj sch'oxan Jehová. Ixlajwi chi', ix javi eb' t'a Refidim, palta malaj ha ha' ta'.
Yuj chi' ix cotxi yoval eb' t'a winhaj Moisés chi': --Ha ticnaic, ak' ha ha' cuq'uej, xchi eb'. --¿Tas yuj scot eyoval t'ayin? ¿Tas yuj tzeyak' proval Jehová? xchi winh.

Palta haxo eb' chonhab' yelk'olal scham eb' yuj taquinhtial, yuj chi' ix q'ue yav eb' t'a winhaj Moisés chi', ix yalan eb': --¿Tas yuj ix onh iq'uelta t'a Egipto? ¿Tom yuj co cham yuj taquinhtial yet' eb' cuninal yet' pax nok' co molb'etzal nok'? xchi eb'.
Yuj chi' ix tevi winhaj Moisés chi' t'a Jehová icha tik: --Mamin, ¿tas val svutej eb' anima tik? Ijan val tzin sjulq'uenej eb', xchi winh.

Ix tak'vi Jehová t'a winh: --Ha ticnaic, b'ab'lajanh t'a yichanh eb' anima chi', tzik'anb'at jayvanhoc eb' yichamtac vinaquil chonhab' chi' ed'oc. Tzik'anpaxb'at te' a k'ococh, te' ak'lab'ejnac a mak'an sat ha' Nilo.

Ha in ol in b'ab'laj t'a ichanh t'a q'uen tenam t'a Horeb, haxo ol ach k'och ta', tza mak'an sat q'ueen yet' te' a k'ococh chi', ol elul ha' t'a sat q'ueen, ol yuk'an ha' eb' anima chi', xchi t'a winh. Icha chi' ix yutej winhaj Moisés chi' t'a yichanh eb' yichamtac vinaquil chonhab' Israel.

Meriba ix yak' winh sb'iej jun lugar chi', yujto chuk ix yal eb' t'a spatic winh. Masah pax ix yak' winh sb'iej, yujto ix yak' proval Jehová eb', ix yalan eb': Mato val ayek' Jehová t'a co cal, mato maay, xchi eb'.
Ayic ayek' eb' israel t'a Refidim chi', ata' ix k'och eb' amalecita yak' oval yet' eb'.

Yuj chi' ix yal winhaj Moisés t'a winhaj Josué: --Siq'uel jantacoc eb' co soldado yic sb'at eb' yak' oval yet' eb' amalecita. Ha k'ik'an tzin b'at t'a chon tzalan, ved'nac te' k'ococh, te' syak'lab'ej Dios, xchi winh.
Ix sk'anab'ajan winhaj Josué chi', ix b'at yak'an oval winh yet' eb' amalecita chi'. Axo winhaj Moisés chi' yet' winhaj Aarón yet' pax winhaj Hur, ix b'at eb' winh t'a chon tzalan chi'.
Ha syik'anq'ue sk'ab' winhaj Moisés t'a chaanh, skan eb' amalecita t'a yalanh yuj eb' israel. Axo syik'anxiem sk'ab' winh, ijan skan eb' winh israel t'a yalanh.

Palta ste k'unb'i sk'ab' winh sb'at jecan, yuj chi' ix say jun q'uen q'ueen winhaj Aarón yet' winhaj Hur chi'. Ha t'a yib'anh q'ueen ix em k'ojan winhaj Moisés chi', haxo eb' winh ix yamanq'ue sk'ab' winh chi', junjun eb' winh t'a stz'eytac winh masanto ix b'at k'u.
Icha chi' ix aj yak'an lajvoc eb' amalecita winhaj Josué chi'.

Ixlajwi chi', ix yalan Jehová t'a winhaj Moisés chi': --Tz'ib'chajocab'kan jun ab'ix tik yic ol nachajcotoc. Tzalanpax t'a winhaj Josué chi' to a in ol in satel masanil eb' amalecita t'a junelnhej, manhxa b'aj ol nachajcot eb', xchi t'a winh.
Ixlajwi chi', ix sb'oanq'ue jun altar winhaj Moisés chi', ix yak'an winh sb'iej icha tik: Ha Jehová b'ab'el cuuj t'a oval.
Ix yalan winh icha tik: Yujto ix yik'chaanh sk'ab' eb' yinhtilal winhaj Amalec yak'an oval yet' Jehová, yuj chi' ol yak'nhej oval Jehová yet' eb' aj Amalec t'a masanil tiempo, xchi winh.
